items.headline: Jeep maker Stellantis is taking $26 billion hit over miscalculating EV demand
items.summary_en: Shares of Stellantis are headed for their worst-ever day of trading after the carmaker announced a massive charge to reset its business.

items.headline: What’s next for Rio Tinto and Glencore after $260 billion megamerger aborted
items.summary_en: The decision by Rio Tinto and Glencore to abandon merger talks now has analysts divided on the companies’ prospects in what JPMorgan has called “the age of critical minerals.”

items.headline: As bitcoin crashes, pity those wildly enthusiastic investors who borrowed billions against crypto

items.headline: ‘Shark Tank’ star Barbara Corcoran has this one piece of advice for buying a home
items.summary_en: Real estate tycoon Barbara Corcoran has revealed the one rule she follows when she is buying homes—explaining how it has helped her ensure she “can always sell” a property later down the line.

items.headline: Novo Nordisk stock climbs out of hole on FDA chief’s threat to block Hims and Hers pill
items.summary_en: Novo Nordisk shares rallied on Friday in what’s still been a painful week as the Food and Drug Administration may weigh in on the side of the Danish drugmaker in its dispute over a copycat drug.
